BackstoryDef.title: neural researcher
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] specialised in neural digitalization and was considered the best of the best on their home planet. When laws and ethical guidelines started to impede [PAWN_possessive] research [PAWN_pronoun] put [PAWN_objective]self in service of a shadowy organisation where [PAWN_pronoun] no longer had to worry about bothersome committees or the public eye and its moral outrage.

BackstoryDef.title: agency digitizer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a digitizer for a government intelligence agency, digitising prisoners, political enemies and other assets at the request of [PAWN_possessive] employer. Over the years [PAWN_possessive] work took a mental toll on [PAWN_objective] until [PAWN_pronoun] decided to quit the agency.

BackstoryDef.title: neural bootlegger
BackstoryDef.description: Living in the underbelly of a thriving glitterworld, [PAWN_nameDef] sold duplicated neural prints of hacked celebrities neural-backups to anyone who could afford them. [PAWN_possessive] services eventually became so well known that [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to flee [PAWN_possessive] home when lawyers and copyright enforcers started to chase [PAWN_objective] to make an example of [PAWN_nameDef].
